short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ProductHunt's true purpose - discover only Bootstrapped, Solo Founder and Open Source Projects with this easy, automatic filter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the essence of innovation on ProductHunt with 'ProductHunt: Indie Return (Unofficial Filter)', a Chrome extension designed to redefine your browsing experience. This extension is an indispensable tool for enthusiasts and professionals who prioritize grassroots innovation.

Key Features:

- Exclusive Focus on Bootstrapped Ventures: Dive into a world where bootstrapping is king. Our extension filters out the noise, spotlighting only those projects built from the ground up with limited resources but unlimited passion.

- Solo Founder Spotlight: Celebrate the spirit of individual entrepreneurship. With a simple click, access a curated list of projects driven by solo founders, showcasing the power of individual vision and dedication.

- Open-Source Projects at Your Fingertips: Immerse yourself in the collaborative and transparent world of open-source projects. Our tool ensures you won't miss out on any open-source gems on ProductHunt.

- Seamless Browsing Experience: Easy to use, the extension integrates smoothly with your ProductHunt browsing, offering a refined feed that aligns with your interests in entrepreneurial and software development landscapes.

Install today and start exploring the real territories of creativity and innovation on ProductHunt!
